$schema.description: The Metaschema of the UI Schema

version.description: Version of the UI Schema. Changes in a major version are backwards compatible. So for a parser for version z.x must be compatible with all versions z.y where y is <=x.

$schema.description: May contain a schema reference to the ui schema

oneOf.title: Control
oneOf.description: Contains a form element, e. g. a text input

autocompleteValues.description: Specifies what should be autocompleted by the browser. Possible values are taken from https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete#values

label.description: Defines whether the fields label is shown

placeholder.description: Will be shown as placeholder in form fields, if supported by field

hidden.description: Sets the visibility of the field to hidden. For example useful in combination with a DateTime field with default:"$now" to create a hidden timestamp.

descendantControlOverrides.description: Allows to override UI options and ShowOn for all descendant controls of this control. The key is the scope of the descendant control. Options will be merged.
descendantControlOverrides.title: Descendant Control Overrides

enabled.description: Set to true to render the field as tags field

enumTitles.title: Titles for enum
enumTitles.description: If the text in a enums select field is supposed to differ from the keys, they can be specified as properties of this object. The value in the enum must be used as property name

stacked.description: Radiobutton-/Checkbox group will be stacked if set to true

displayAs.title: Display As
displayAs.description: Choose how an enum should be displayed

allowMultipleFiles.description: Allows the upload of multiple files with fileupload

multi.description:
If set true, textarea will be shown instead of textfield. 
 Alternatively can be set to the number of wanted lines

autocomplete.description: Specifies what should be autocompleted by the browser. Possible values are taken from https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete#values

range.description: If set true, a range input will be shown instead of a text input

textAlign.description: Set the text-align of input fields

options.title: Options
options.description: Gives multiple options to configure the element

enabled.description: Set to true to render the field as tags field

enumTitles.title: Titles for enum
enumTitles.description: If the text in a enums select field is supposed to differ from the keys, they can be specified as properties of this object. The value in the enum must be used as property name

stacked.description: Radiobutton-/Checkbox group will be stacked if set to true

displayAs.title: Display As
displayAs.description: Choose how an enum should be displayed

allowMultipleFiles.description: Allows the upload of multiple files with fileupload

oneOf.title: Input Options
oneOf.description: Options for text fields

multi.description:
If set true, textarea will be shown instead of textfield. 
 Alternatively can be set to the number of wanted lines

autocomplete.description: Specifies what should be autocompleted by the browser. Possible values are taken from https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Attributes/autocomplete#values

range.description: If set true, a range input will be shown instead of a text input

textAlign.description: Set the text-align of input fields

scope.description: A json pointer referring to the form element in the forms json schema

oneOf.title: HTML Renderer
oneOf.description: Some HTML to be rendered in the form

oneOf.title: Divider
oneOf.description: inserts a simple divider

oneOf.title: Button
oneOf.description: Used to put a button into the form

formnovalidate.description: Specifies that the form-data should not be validated on submission

submitOptions.title: Submit Options
submitOptions.description: Options that are passed to the submit function. This will not change the behaviour of VueJsonForm itself, but can bes used by the application/the webcomponent to change the behaviour of the submit function.

action.description: Action to perform when the button is clicked

requestUrl.description: The URL to send the request to if `action` is `request`

oneOf.title: Buttongroup
oneOf.description: Used to group buttons

buttons.description: The buttons in the button group

showOn.title: ShowOn property
showOn.description: Show field depending on value of other field

legacyShowOn.title: Legacy ShowOn property
legacyShowOn.description: Legacy Variant of defining ShowOn property

path.description: The field this field depends on in object notation

referenceValue.description: The value the field from scope is compared against

oneOf.title: Legacy ShowOn property
oneOf.description: Legacy Variant of defining ShowOn property

path.description: The field this field depends on in object notation

referenceValue.description: The value the field from scope is compared against

oneOf.description:
Rita Rule
See https://educorvi.github.io/rita/rita-core/docs/schema/#/rule
oneOf.title: Rule

comment.description: A comment about what the rule does

oneOf.title: Non-Unary operator
oneOf.description: Requires at least two arguments

oneOf.title: Unary operator
oneOf.description: Requires exactly on parameter

oneOf.title: Atom
oneOf.description: Describes an atom. Those can be used to read Data

path.description: The path to the atom in the data

isDate.description: Must be set to true if the atom should be parsed as a date

oneOf.title: Plugin
oneOf.description: Describes an plugin
Compare strings, dates or numbers with each other
oneOf.title: Comparison

operation.description: Selects how the arguments should be compared

allowDifferentTypes.description: Indicates if different types are allowed inside a comparison. This follows the JavaScript rules for comparison (=== is used for equals).

oneOf.title: Atom
oneOf.description: Describes an atom. Those can be used to read Data

path.description: The path to the atom in the data

isDate.description: Must be set to true if the atom should be parsed as a date

oneOf.title: Macro
oneOf.description: Describes macros. Available macros are `now` and `length`

oneOf.title: now
oneOf.description: Returns the current time

oneOf.title: length
oneOf.description: Returns the length of an array

array.title: Atom
array.description: Describes an atom. Those can be used to read Data

path.description: The path to the atom in the data

isDate.description: Must be set to true if the atom should be parsed as a date

oneOf.title: Calculation
oneOf.description: Calculates a result

operation.description: The mathematical operation to be calculated. Modulo refers to the function mod(a,b)=a-(floor(a/b)*b)

oneOf.title: Atom
oneOf.description: Describes an atom. Those can be used to read Data

path.description: The path to the atom in the data

isDate.description: Must be set to true if the atom should be parsed as a date

oneOf.title: Macro
oneOf.description: Describes macros. Available macros are `now` and `length`

oneOf.title: now
oneOf.description: Returns the current time

oneOf.title: length
oneOf.description: Returns the length of an array

array.title: Atom
array.description: Describes an atom. Those can be used to read Data

path.description: The path to the atom in the data

isDate.description: Must be set to true if the atom should be parsed as a date

oneOf.title: Date Calculation
oneOf.description: Calculations involving dates

operation.description: Add/subtract a time interval to/from a date or subtract two dates to get the interval between them

oneOf.title: Atom
oneOf.description: Describes an atom. Those can be used to read Data

path.description: The path to the atom in the data

isDate.description: Must be set to true if the atom should be parsed as a date

oneOf.title: Macro
oneOf.description: Describes macros. Available macros are `now` and `length`

oneOf.title: now
oneOf.description: Returns the current time

oneOf.title: length
oneOf.description: Returns the length of an array

array.title: Atom
array.description: Describes an atom. Those can be used to read Data

path.description: The path to the atom in the data

isDate.description: Must be set to true if the atom should be parsed as a date

dateCalculationUnit.description: What unit time intervals given as arguments will be in.

dateResultUnit.description: What unit time intervals representing the result will be in.

oneOf.title: Quantifier
oneOf.description: Quantifiers that can be used to evaluate rules on arrays in Data

array.title: Data array
array.description: This can either be an Atom that references an array in the data, or an array of rules

oneOf.title: Atom
oneOf.description: Describes an atom. Those can be used to read Data

path.description: The path to the atom in the data

isDate.description: Must be set to true if the atom should be parsed as a date

placeholder.description: This is a placeholder name for the current array object. This is the property name with wich you can reference the current value in the subsequent rule

indexPlaceholder.description: This is a placeholder name for the current index of the array object. This is the property name with wich you can reference the current index in the subsequent rule

label.description: Adds a label for groups (only for type=Group)
